item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Requirements Install the Deno CLI. This is for mac. Other installation methods can be found here. curl -fsSL https://deno.land/install.sh | sh Ensure deno is available in the environment path deno --version Set up your environment Install vscode deno extension. Open the VS Code command palette with Ctrl+Shift+P, and run the Deno: Initialize Workspace Configuration command. Create webapp directory This will be the working directory of your web application.
